so_17418810: for file in "$@"
do
    name=$(echo "$file" | sed 's/[A-Z][A-Z].MPG$/.mpg/')
    mv "$file" "$name"
done

$ for file in 1602017EN.MPG 1802312EN.MPG; do echo ${file/[A-Z][A-Z].MPG/.mpg}; done
1602017.mpg
1802312.mpg
$
